channel.title: About the private category
channel.description:
Welcome to [cregox public forums][1]!
**All topics here are unlisted**. This means they are not displayed in any topic lists and **the only way to access them** is via direct link.
[This category][2] is a subcategory of [support][3]. Refer to [its about][4] for more info.
[1]: http://talk.cregox.com [2]: /talk/c/support/private [3]: /talk/c/support [4]: /talk/t/about-the-support-category/5839

item.title: About the private category
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:

Welcome to cregox public forums!
